nodes.text: A Human male slavedriver was in the employ of Governor Koong of Tawntoom Province on the planet of Roon in 15 BBY. That year, the slavedriver oversaw a galley full of slaves and forced them to row across the Roon Sea to Koong Island. Nevertheless, the astromech droid R2-D2 sneaked aboard the boat at night and freed the prisoners. The slavedriver was incapacitated in the ensuing mass escape.
